tool_description: Detailed, filterable info on cities, states, and counties in the US for demographic, geographic, and statistical analysis.
name: Cities API
title: Cities API

api_list.name: getCities
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a comprehensive list of cities from the US Census Bureau database. It supports various filters and pagination for efficient data access. Users can filter cities by name, county name, FIPS code, state abbreviation or name, ZIP codes, and time zone. The endpoint also allows specifying the number of records to fetch (limit) and the starting point (offset) for paginated results. This is ideal for developers and analysts needing detailed city-level demographic, geographic, and statistical data from the United States.

api_list.name: getCounties
api_list.description: Retrieve a detailed list of counties across the United States with options for filtering and pagination. This endpoint allows users to filter counties by state abbreviation or name, FIPS code, county name, and time zone. It's essential for applications and analyses that require comprehensive county-level data from the US Census Bureau, including geographic boundaries, population statistics, and more.

api_list.name: getStates
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a list of all US states with their abbreviations and names as recorded in the US Census Bureau database. It's a straightforward resource for applications that need a quick reference or dropdown list of states without the overhead of additional demographic or geographic data. Suitable for form inputs, location services, and general reference in various applications.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cities-api4.p.rapidapi.com/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cities-api4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cities-api4.p.rapidapi.com/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cities-api4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
